si.title: கடந்த 24 மணி நேர காலப்பகுதியில் மதுபோதையில் வாகனம் செலுத்திய குற்றச்சாட்டில் 401 பேர் கைது
body_lines: 24 දෙනෙකු සඳුදා (30) අලුයම 6.00 ට අවසන් වූ රියදුරන් 8068 දෙනෙකුට එරෙහිව නීතිමය ක්රියාමාර්ග ගෙන ඇති බව නීති orney පොලිස් අධිකාරී අමෝඩ් බුද්ධිකා මනතුංග මහතා පැවසීය.

பண்டிகைக் காலங்களில் வாகன விபத்துகளை குறைக்கும் நோக்கில் பதில் பொலிஸ் மா அதிபரின் பணிப்புரைக்கமைய கடந்த 20 ஆம் திகதி முதல் நாடளாவிய ரீதியில் விசேட போக்குவரத்து நடவடிக்கை அமுல்படுத்தப்பட்டுள்ளது. මෙම පසුබිම තුළ රිය පැදවීමේ චෝදනාව මත රියදුරන් 401 දෙනෙකුට එරෙහිව නීතිවිරෝධී ක්රියාමාර්ග ගෙන ඇති අතර එය ඉරිදා (29) උදේ 6.00 ට අවසන් විය.

In addition, 8,068 drivers, including 53 drivers, 53 drivers, 48 ​​​​drivers, 48 ​​​​drivers, 1350 drivers, 865 drivers, and other traffic violations, including 5,351 drivers in connection with the violation of permission.

මත්පැන් පානය කරන විට රිය පැදවීමේ රියදුරන්ට එරෙහිව මාස 12 ක් රියදුරු බලපත්රය අත්හිටවනු ලැබේ.. රජයේ ප්රවාහන රියදුරන් චෝදනා මත අත්අඩංගුවට ගෙන තිබේ නම් රියදුරු බලපත්රය අවලංගු කරනු ලබන බව සැලකිල්ලට ගැනීම වැදගත්ය.
මත්පැන් පානය කිරීමේදී වාහනයක් පැදවීමෙන් වළකින්නැයි මම සියලු රියදුරන්ට ඉල්ලා සිටිමි. විශේෂ රථවාහන පරීක්ෂණය දිගටම කරගෙන යනු ඇති බව ද ඔහු පැවසීය.

en.title: About 401 arrested on charges of dripping alcohol over the past 24 hours
body_lines: Police Superintendent of Police, Attorney -at -Law Buddhika Manatunga said that legal action has been taken against 8068 drivers, including 401 persons, including 401 people, on the allegations of dripping in the 24 -hour period, which ended at 6.00 am on Monday (30).

Special traffic operations have been implemented across the country since the 20th of this month, in response to the Directorate of the Inspector General of Police in response to the aim of reducing vehicle accidents during the festive season.. In this backdrop, legal action has been taken against 401 drivers on charges of driving only during the 24 -hour period, which ended at 6.00 am on Sunday (29).

In addition, 8,068 drivers, including 53 drivers, 53 drivers, 48 ​​drivers, 48 ​​drivers, 1350 drivers, 865 drivers, and other traffic violations, including 5,351 drivers in connection with the violation of permission.

The driver's license will be suspended for 12 months against the drivers who are driving while intoxicated.. It is also important to note that the driver's license will be canceled if the public transport drivers are arrested on the charges.
I request all drivers to avoid driving a vehicle while intoxicating. He also said that the special traffic test will continue to be carried out.
